generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Open+Sans:ital,wght@0,400;0,700;1,400;1,700&display=swap");:root{--colorPrincipal:#328cc1;--colorSecundario:#0b3c5d;--colorOscuro:#1d2731;--resaltar:#d9b310}ul.breadcrumb{padding:10px 16px;list-style:none;background-color:#eee;text-align:left}ul.breadcrumb li{display:inline;font-size:1.1rem}ul.breadcrumb li+li:before{padding:8px;color:#000;content:"/\00a0"}ul.breadcrumb li a{color:#0275d8;text-decoration:none}ul.breadcrumb li a:hover{color:#01447e;text-decoration:underline}.piePagina:hover{-webkit-clip-path:circle(100% at 50% 100%);clip-path:circle(100% at 50% 100%);transition:all .6s}.contenedorRedesSociales img:hover{transform:scale(1.1)}.btn:hover{background-color:var(--resaltar);color:#fff}.tarjeta a img:hover{opacity:.85}.tarjeta-arrow:focus{outline:0}.tarjeta-arrow svg{width:12px;height:100%;color:rgba(0,0,0,.7)}.contenidoCentral{width:75%;margin:auto;padding-top:25px;padding-bottom:15px}.book .book-image{width:100%;height:225px;position:relative;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:50% 50%}.book .book-label.label-blue{background:#046380;color:#020f14}.book .book-label.label-bluerain{background:var(--colorSecundario)}.book .book-label.label-yellow{background:var(--resaltar)}.book .book-label{height:20px;overflow:hidden;position:absolute;bottom:0;text-align:center;color:#fff;transition:all .2s ease-in-out;border-top-left-radius:10px;border-top-right-radius:10px;border-bottom-left-radius:10px;border-bottom-right-radius:10px}.book:hover .book-label{height:100%;border-radius:10px 10px 0 0}.book .book-label p{padding:0 15px}.book .book-by span{color:#5586e2}.book .book-title{padding:10px 20px;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;font-size:1.3rem;line-height:16px;margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:0}.book .book-by{color:#7c8e9c}.book .book-by,.book .book-number{font-size:1.2rem;text-align:center}.book .book-number{font-weight:300}.piePagina-itemsNavegacion a:hover{text-decoration:underline;color:var(--resaltar)}.seccionClub{padding-bottom:50px;text-align:left}.contenedorLectura{width:85%;margin:auto;padding-top:25px;padding-bottom:15px}.fichaTecnica{text-align:left}.fichaTecnica dl{padding-bottom:15px}.fichaTecnica dt{border-bottom:1px solid #000;font-weight:700;padding-top:8px;margin-bottom:8px}.fichaTecnica dd{line-height:25px;margin-left:15px;font-size:1.2rem}.biografia{text-align:justify;line-height:25px}.biografia h2{padding-bottom:15px}.biografia h3{font-size:2.2rem}.biografia h3,.cuadroCita{padding-bottom:15px;padding-top:15px}.cuadroCita{position:relative;text-align:center;border-left:3px solid #000;border-right:3px solid #000;background-color:#d3d3d3}.cuadroCita p{line-height:20px}.imagen-capital{float:left;width:190px;height:190px;margin-right:10px;border-radius:150px;shape-outside:circle()}.relacionados{overflow:hidden}.relacionados li{list-style:none;font-size:1.2rem}.relacionados a{text-decoration:none}.relacionados a:hover{text-decoration:underline;color:var(--resaltar)}.img-responsive{display:block;max-width:100%}.tituloClub{background-color:#252839}.tituloClub h2{width:-webkit-fit-content;width:-moz-fit-content;width:fit-content;position:relative;color:#252839}.tituloClub h2:before{content:attr(data-foo);position:absolute;width:0;color:#01fe87;border-right:2px solid #01fe87;overflow:hidden;-webkit-animation:mostrarTitulo 6s linear infinite;animation:mostrarTitulo 6s linear infinite;white-space:nowrap}@-webkit-keyframes mostrarTitulo{0%,10%,to{width:0}70%,90%{width:100%}}@keyframes mostrarTitulo{0%,10%,to{width:0}70%,90%{width:100%}}.animacionLogo{width:80px;cursor:pointer;padding-top:5px;padding-bottom:5px;-webkit-animation:giraLogo 7s infinite;animation:giraLogo 7s infinite}@-webkit-keyframes giraLogo{0%{transform:rotateY(0deg)}50%{transform:rotateY(180deg)}to{transform:rotateY(1turn)}}@keyframes giraLogo{0%{transform:rotateY(0deg)}50%{transform:rotateY(180deg)}to{transform:rotateY(1turn)}}.cardRelacionados{box-shadow:0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2);padding-bottom:10px}.cardRelacionados-titulo{background-color:var(--colorSecundario);color:#fff}.fotoCircular{-webkit-clip-path:circle(50% at 50% 50%);clip-path:circle(50% at 50%
